== Ubuntu Accomplishments Classroom ==

We are passionate about growing an awesome contributor community for Ubuntu Accomplishments, and as part of this effort, we are holding a series of live video tutorials in which you can get involved and contribute to the project with programming, writing documentation, testing, translations, support and various other topics.

You can read more documentation about getting involved <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.com/Accomplishments/GetInvolved|here.]]</nowiki>

=== How To Participate ===

Taking part is simple! Simply go to http://ubuntuonair.com/ when the sessions begin!
